column51: the accum fields are so that we can do a loop increment and compare in 1 cycle. also imm1 + imm9 = imm10
load immediates (only 25 bits not a full 32, sign extend), jal instruction (shift by 2 for jal).
Vector Vector  sac = sys array control -> weights vs inputs bit.
Vector Immediate, imm[13:0] = {imm8, imm5} -> for arithmetic stuff | also used for Systolic Array

rc_id = which row/column, mask = loading, sid = which scpad, num_rows = given number rows, 
num_cols = given cols, rc = row or column, vd = vector destination, rs1 = base_row of scpad,
sid = scratchpad_id; rs2 = register with gmem_base_addr; rs1 = rd1 = register with scpad_base_addr
